about.title: About DamDoh
about.subtitle: Connecting the global agricultural supply chain for a sustainable future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower all stakeholders in the agricultural supply chain, from smallholder farmers to multinational corporations, with the data, tools, and connections needed to thrive in a complex and ever-changing global market. We aim to foster transparency, efficiency, and sustainability from farm to fork.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: A globally connected, data-driven agricultural ecosystem where every participant has the opportunity for sustainable growth and prosperity. We envision a world where technology and collaboration have eliminated food insecurity and built resilient, equitable supply chains.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.content: We are committed to practices that support environmental health, social equity, and economic viability for generations to come.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: We believe that by working together, we can solve the industry's biggest challenges. Our platform is built to facilitate partnerships and communication.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We continuously seek and develop cutting-edge solutions, from AI-driven insights to blockchain-based traceability, to serve our community.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.content: We operate with transparency and honesty, building trust among our users by ensuring data privacy, security, and accuracy.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.content: We strive to level the playing field by providing all users, regardless of size or location, with access to critical information and market opportunities.

team.title: Our Team
team.intro: DamDoh is led by a diverse team of agronomists, technologists, supply chain experts, and entrepreneurs who are passionate about revolutionizing agriculture.
team.member1Bio: An expert in agronomy and international development with 20 years of experience in sustainable agriculture.
team.member2Bio: A seasoned software architect with a background in building scalable, secure platforms for global logistics.
team.member3Bio: A specialist in forging connections between smallholder cooperatives and international markets.
team.note: Note: Team members are illustrative representations for this demo.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or a partnership proposal, please reach out.

callUs.title: Call Us
callUs.hours: Our phone lines are open Monday - Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM (Your Timezone).

ourOffice.title: Our Office
ourOffice.address: 123 Agri-Tech Avenue, Food Security City, Global

sendMessage.title: Send Us a Message
sendMessage.note: Note: This form is for demonstration. Actual submission is not implemented.

knowledgeHub.title: DamDoh Knowledge Hub
knowledgeHub.description: Your central resource for agricultural courses, best practices, and industry insights.

courses.title: Structured Courses
courses.description: Learn at your own pace with our expert-led courses.
courses.body: From sustainable farming techniques to navigating international trade, our courses are designed to provide you with actionable knowledge and skills. Enroll today to start your learning journey.

blog.title: Insights & Articles
blog.description: Stay informed with the aatest news and analysis.
blog.body: Our blog features articles from industry experts on market trends, new technologies, policy changes, and success stories from the community. Stay ahead of the curve.

AppFooter.tagline: Bridging the agricultural supply chain for a thriving people, profit, and planet.

traceabilityPage.title: Traceability Hub
traceabilityPage.description: Follow the journey of agricultural products from farm to shelf. Enter a Verified Traceability ID (VTI) to begin.
traceabilityPage.vtiDescription: A VTI is a unique identifier assigned to a specific batch of products in the DamDoh system.
traceabilityPage.recentDescription: Your recently tracked items will appear here for quick access.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to DamDoh. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data in an open and transparent manner. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal and business information when you use our agricultural supply chain platform.

whatInfoWeCollect.heading: 1. What Information Do We Collect?
whatInfoWeCollect.content: We collect information that you provide to us directly, such as when you create an account (name, email, role), build your profile (location, specialties), or list products. We also collect data automatically, like your IP address and device type, and may collect data from third-party sources to supplement your profile, such as from public records or data partners.

howWeUseInfo.heading: 2. How Do We Use Your Information?
howWeUseInfo.content: Your information is used to operate, maintain, and improve our platform. This includes facilitating connections, enabling marketplace transactions, personalizing your experience, providing AI-driven insights, and for security and compliance purposes. We may also use your data for analytics to understand industry trends.

willInfoBeShared.heading: 3. Will Your Information Be Shared With Anyone?
willInfoBeShared.content: We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations. Your public profile is visible to other platform users. We may share data with trusted third-party service providers for functions like payment processing or data analysis, and with financial institutions if you explicitly consent to apply for a service.

cookiesAndTracking.heading: 4. Do We Use Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies?
cookiesAndTracking.content: Yes, we use cookies and similar tracking technologies to access or store information to help us operate and analyze our platform's performance. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

howLongWeKeepInfo.heading: 5. How Long Do We Keep Your Information?
howLongWeKeepInfo.content: We keep your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy unless otherwise required by law. This generally means as long as you have an active account with us.

howWeKeepInfoSafe.heading: 6. How Do We Keep Your Information Safe?
howWeKeepInfoSafe.content: We have implemented a variety of security measures to protect your information, including encryption and access controls. However, no electronic transmission over the internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure, so we cannot promise or guarantee that hackers, cybercriminals, or other unauthorized third parties will not be able to defeat our security.

minors.heading: 7. Do We Collect Information From Minors?
minors.content: We do not knowingly collect data from or market to children under 18 years of age. By using the platform, you represent that you are at least 18.

privacyRights.heading: 8. What Are Your Privacy Rights?
privacyRights.content: You may review, change, or terminate your account at any time. Depending on your location, you may have rights such as the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can manage your data directly in the platform's settings or by contacting us.

controlsForDoNotTrack.heading: 9. Controls for Do-Not-Track Features
controlsForDoNotTrack.content: Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems include a Do-Not-Track ('DNT') feature. At this stage, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online.

updatesToNotice.heading: 10. Do We Make Updates to This Notice?
updatesToNotice.content: Yes, we will update this notice as necessary to stay compliant with relevant laws and to reflect any changes in our practices. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a notice on our platform or by sending you a direct notification.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement made between you and DamDoh, concerning your access to and use of the platform. You agree that by accessing the site, you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all of these Terms of Service.

agreementToTerms.heading: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By using the DamDoh platform, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree with all of these terms, then you are expressly prohibited from using the site and you must discontinue use immediately.

intellectualProperty.heading: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: Unless otherwise indicated, the platform is our proprietary property. All source code, databases, functionality, software, website designs, audio, video, text, photographs, and graphics on the Site (collectively, the 'Content') and the trademarks, service marks, and logos contained therein (the 'Marks') are owned or controlled by us or licensed to us, and are protected by copyright and trademark laws.

userRepresentations.heading: 3. User Representations
userRepresentations.content: By using the Site, you represent and warrant that: (1) all registration information you submit will be true, accurate, current, and complete; (2) you will maintain the accuracy of such information; (3) you have the legal capacity and you agree to comply with these Terms of Service; (4) you are not a minor in the jurisdiction in which you reside; (5) you will not access the Site through automated or non-human means, whether through a bot, script or otherwise.

prohibitedActivities.heading: 4. Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.content: You may not access or use the Site for any purpose other than that for which we make the Site available. The Site may not be used in connection with any commercial endeavors except those that are specifically endorsed or approved by us. This includes, but is not limited to, fraudulent activities, attempting to impersonate another user, and interfering with the platform's security features.

platformManagement.heading: 5. Platform Management
platformManagement.content: We reserve the right, but not the obligation, to: (1) monitor the Site for violations of these Terms of Service; (2) take appropriate legal action against anyone who, in our sole discretion, violates the law or these Terms of Service; (3) in our sole discretion and without limitation, refuse, restrict access to, limit the availability of, or disable any of your contributions.

termAndTermination.heading: 6. Term and Termination
termAndTermination.content: These Terms of Service shall remain in full force and effect while you use the Site. WITHOUT LIMITING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF THESE TERMS OF SERVICE, WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO, IN OUR SOLE DISCRETION AND WITHOUT NOTICE OR LIABILITY, DENY ACCESS TO AND USE OF THE SITE.

modificationsAndInterruptions.heading: 7. Modifications and Interruptions
modificationsAndInterruptions.content: We reserve the right to change, modify, or remove the contents of the Site at any time or for any reason at our sole discretion without notice. We also reserve the right to modify or discontinue all or part of the Site without notice at any time. We will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, price change, suspension, or discontinuance of the Site.

governingLaw.heading: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and defined following the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. DamDoh and yourself irrevocably consent that the courts of [Your Jurisdiction] shall have exclusive jurisdiction to resolve any dispute which may arise in connection with these terms.

disputeResolution.heading: 9. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: To expedite resolution and control the cost of any dispute, you agree to first attempt to negotiate any dispute informally for at least thirty (30) days before initiating arbitration. Such informal negotiations commence upon written notice from one person to the other.

contactUs.heading: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.content: In order to resolve a complaint regarding the Site or to receive further information regarding use of the Site, please contact us.

termsOfService.conclusion: If you have any questions, you can <contactLink>contact us</contactLink>.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Manage your account, agricultural profile, and platform preferences.

stakeholderProfile.title: Stakeholder Profile Settings
stakeholderProfile.description: Update your public information for the agricultural supply chain network.
stakeholderProfile.summaryPlaceholder: e.g., Exporter of fair-trade coffee, specializing in East African beans...
stakeholderProfile.bioPlaceholder: Share more about your operations, mission, products, services, or what you're seeking in the supply chain...
stakeholderProfile.interestsPlaceholder: e.g., Organic farming, Supply chain logistics, Export, Cashew processing
stakeholderProfile.needsPlaceholder: e.g., Buyers for cocoa beans, Warehousing space, Agronomy consulting

account.title: Account Settings
account.description: Manage your login credentials and account security.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Choose how you want to be notified about supply chain activity and platform updates.
notifications.emailDigestDescription: Receive a summary of important updates, market news, and connection requests.
notifications.connectionRequestsDescription: Notify me in-app and optionally by email for new stakeholder connection requests.
notifications.forumMentionsDescription: Notify me for replies to my forum posts or when I'm mentioned.
notifications.marketplaceActivityDescription: Notify me about inquiries on my listings or updates to saved searches.
notifications.talentExchangeDescription: Notify me about applications to my job/service listings or new relevant offerings.

privacy.title: Privacy & Visibility Settings
privacy.description: Control who can see your agricultural profile and supply chain activity.
privacy.profileVisibilityDescription: Control who can view your full stakeholder profile details.
privacy.connectionRequestsDescription: Control who can send you connection requests.
privacy.contactInfoVisibilityDescription: Control who sees your email, phone, or website if provided.
privacy.activityStatusDescription: Let others see when you are online or last active.
privacy.searchIndexingDescription: Allow search engines (e.g., Google) to link to your DamDoh profile (public parts only).
privacy.dataConsentDescription: Manage how your data is used and shared with other stakeholders or integrated services.
privacy.marketplaceHistoryDescription: Allows Financial Institutions to view your sales history when you apply for a loan or service, to assess your eligibility.
privacy.traceabilityDataDescription: Allows buyers to view the public traceability log of products you have listed, building trust and transparency.
privacy.financialApplicationDataDescription: Allow DamDoh's AI to analyze your application data to recommend other relevant financial products or services to you.

appearance.title: Appearance

appearance.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

walletPage.title: My Digital Wallet
walletPage.description: Manage your DamDoh credits for trading, investments, and platform services (Feature Coming Soon).
walletPage.underDevelopmentDescription: We are building a secure and efficient digital wallet to facilitate transactions within the DamDoh ecosystem. Future capabilities will include:
walletPage.feature1: Viewing your credit balance and transaction history.
walletPage.feature2: Requesting credit for approved investments or large trades.
walletPage.feature3: Securely topping-up your wallet using various payment methods.
walletPage.feature4: Facilitating payments for marketplace transactions and platform services.
walletPage.stayTuned: Stay tuned for updates as we work to enable seamless and secure financial activities for the DamDoh agricultural network.
